content:
Finally #12258 brings us up to date! Should be easy to review.

lake update is making duplicate entries: I propose leaving as is, and we can ask @Mac Malone if he can work out what is going on.
In particular, @Mac Malone, it seems that after deleting the std entries in lake-manifest.json, the duplicates reappear as soon as we run lake update.
I think that there is currently nothing to do! :-)
Oh -- in other news, Leo has further ideas for updating IsDefEq that he hopes will improve performance again, and will try these out over the weekend.
We're currently thinking to do v4.8.0-rc1 on approximately May 1.
@Kim Morrison The bug you found should be fixed by lean4#3957.
